Requirement: 
1.Recently Clicked pp size photos-4 
2.Your Academics Certificates 
3.Birth Certificate 
4.Gaurdians Citizenship

Steps: 
1.First you have to write an application to Your VDC/Municipality Ward Head. 
2.Fill out the form and get verified by the Head of the ward 
3.Take the verified document to the Nagrita Karyalaya to get your citizenship. 
4.Go with your parents as their signature is required.
